page.title: 07Children's Games West Brom
page.content: Girls play games such as skipping which requires a rope, which is swung around and then jumped over or hop scotch which requires numbered chalked squares and a pebble. Boys play football, rugby, cricket and tennis. Girls enjoy playing rounders. At school swimming is taken each week. In the playground games such as tick and chase or jumping over a piece of elastic stretched between the legs are games invented by children. Bulldog is an old game played by two teams. One person from a team tries to reach the area of the opposing team. It is quite a rough game but good fun. Board games such as draughts, monopoly, snakes and ladders are games played indoors. Many different kinds of card games are also played by children who also sew and knit.
